duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing quality calls and representing the dealership in a positive and professional manner.
Setting appointments for automotive dealerships nationwide.
Effectively navigating dual screen, multi-tab, multiple platform programs while guiding a phone conversation with a prospect.
Taking notes during the call of the relevant points for the dealership.
Communicating using proper English and grammar in a one on one and team environment.
Demonstrating effective time management and multitasking ability.
